description:
The warden Uighur has guessed that Kenshiro cannot kill women, and sends Bella, the successor to the Crimson Fist of Lotus Mountain, against him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Crimson Orchid Mountain Fist! A Birth of a Tragic Woman!!
